ValidationRule.description: This validation rule prevents the leads from getting converted to "converted to contact" status if opportunity is either selected or created as part of the conversion
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISCHANGED(IsConverted) && IsConverted==true && ((RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Direct_Sales')||(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'TXLE_Lead')) && ConvertedOpportunityId !=null && ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Converted To Contact')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Lead Conversion Status Cannot Be Converted To Contact With Opportunity Association
